exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : lb H : c ⪯ a H0 : c ⪯ b H1 : forall a b c : lb, a ↓ (b ↓ c) ⪯ a ↓ b ↓ c Unable to unify "?M1485 ↓ (?M1486 ↓ ?M1487) ⪯ ?M1485 ↓ ?M1486 ↓ ?M1487" with "c ⪯ a ↓ b".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
c: lb
b: lb
a: lb

Goal:
c ⪯ a -> c ⪯ b -> c ⪯ a ↓ b

Premises:
Notation lb := (list bool)
lb_join_spec : forall a b c : lb, a ⪯ c -> b ⪯ c -> a ↑ b ⪯ c
lb_meet_assoc : forall a b c : lb, a ↓ (b ↓ c) ≂ a ↓ b ↓ c
lb_meet_join_distr : forall a b c : lb, a ↓ (b ↑ c) ≂ a ↓ b ↑ a ↓ c
lb_join_meet_distr : forall a b c : lb, a ↑ b ↓ c ≂ (a ↑ b) ↓ (a ↑ c)
lb_meet_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↓ a ⪯ m ↓ b
lb_join_assoc : forall a b c : lb, a ↑ (b ↑ c) ≂ a ↑ b ↑ c
lb_join_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↑ a ⪯ m ↑ b
lb_mask_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ++ a ⪯ m ++ b
lb_ortho_anti : forall a b x y : lb, a ⪯ b -> x ⪯ y -> b ⟂ y -> a ⟂ x
lb_meet_dec_left : forall a b : lb, a ↓ b ⪯ a
lb_mask_meet : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b < -> a ↓ b ≂ a
lb_meet_dec_right : forall a b : lb, a ↓ b ⪯ b
lb_ortho_anti_left : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x
lb_pointwise_mono_left : forall f : bool -> bool -> bool, (forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b) -> f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ -> forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> lb_pointwise f k l ⪯ lb_pointwise f k m
Record sign_theory (C : Type) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (get_sign : C -> option C) : Prop := mksign_th { sign_spec : forall c c' : C, get_sign c = Some c' -> ceqb c (copp c') = ⟙ } Arguments Ring_theory.sign_theory [C]%type_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Ring_theory.mksign_th [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope
lb_join_inc_left : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ a ↑ b
lb_mask_join : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b < -> a ↑ b ≂ b
lb_join_inc_right : forall a b : lb, b ⪯ a ↑ b
lb_mask_equiv = fun l m : lb => l ⪯ m /\ m ⪯ l : lb -> lb -> Prop Arguments lb_mask_equiv (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_meet_length : forall a b : lb, length a = length b -> length (a ↓ b) = length a
lb_meet_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> (l ++ a) ↓ (m ++ b) = l ↓ m ++ a ↓ b
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
Field_theory.ceqb_spec : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall c c' : C, BoolSpec (req (phi c) (phi c')) True (ceqb c c')
lb_ortho_sym : forall a b : lb, a ⟂ b -> b ⟂ a
lb_mask_equiv_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ≂ m -> a ≂ b -> l ++ a ≂ m ++ b
lb_mask_trans : forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> m ⪯ k -> l ⪯ k
in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_inv_nil : forall l : lb, ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil -> l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_mask_le_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⪯ x0 < -> y ⪯ y0
Field_theory.rdiv8 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b : R, ~ req b rO -> req a rO -> req (rdiv a b) rO
lb_mask_inv_left : forall (x : bool) (l : lb), x :: l ⪯ nil -> x = ⟘ /\ l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_inv_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⪯ y :: m -> x ⪦ y /\ l ⪯ m
lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive = lb_mask_equiv_trans : Transitive lb_mask_equiv Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive : forall [x y z : lb], x ≂ y -> y ≂ z -> x ⪯ z /\ z ⪯ x Arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive [x y z]
lb_meet_idem : forall a : lb, a ↓ a = a
Record div_theory (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cadd cmul : C -> C -> C) (phi : C -> R) (cdiv : C -> C -> C * C) : Prop := mkdiv_th { div_eucl_th : forall a b : C, let (q, r) := cdiv a b in req (phi a) (phi (cadd (cmul b q) r)) } Arguments Ring_theory.div_theory [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Ring_theory.mkdiv_th [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
lb_mask_le_iff_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (fun H7 : x1 ⪯ x2 => lb_mask_trans H3 (lb_mask_trans H7 H5)) (fun H7 : y1 ⪯ y2 => lb_mask_trans H2 (lb_mask_trans H7 H6)) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> iff) lb_mask Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_mask_le_iff_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> (x ⪯ x0 -> y ⪯ y0)...
